item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 21, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. DeepSeek Open Infra: Open-Sourcing 5 AI Repos in 5 Days (130 points | 16 comments)
2. Show HN: Immersive Gaussian Splat experience of Sutro Tower, San Francisco (475 points | 137 comments)
3. Show HN: BadSeek – How to backdoor large language models (224 points | 56 comments)
4. US Judge invalidates blood glucose sensor patent, opens door for Apple Watch (36 points | 2 comments)
5. Running Pong in 240 browser tabs (191 points | 23 comments)
6. TinyCompiler: A compiler in a week-end (156 points | 49 comments)
7. Introduction to CUDA programming for Python developers (126 points | 50 comments)
8. Open and closed universes (2021) (17 points | 1 comment)
9. The Shape of a Mars Mission (17 points | 7 comments)
10. Helix: A vision-language-action model for generalist humanoid control (261 points | 149 comments)
11. Five Kinds of Nondeterminism (67 points | 15 comments)
12. How browsers really load web pages [video] (102 points | 37 comments)
13. Nginx: try_files Is Evil Too (2024) (65 points | 4 comments)
14. Exa Laboratories (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer to Build AI Chips ( | hide)
15. When your last name is Null, nothing works (174 points | 184 comments)
16. Just barely fitting a full wi-fi stack on the nRF9151 (15 points | discuss)
17. BritCSS: Fixes CSS to use non-American English (65 points | 46 comments)
18. A Clang regression related to switch statements and inlining (20 points | 1 comment)
19. Launch HN: Confident AI (YC W25) – Open-source evaluation framework for LLM apps (99 points | 19 comments)
20. Spice86 – A PC emulator for real mode reverse engineering (145 points | 33 comments)
21. Show HN: I built an AI voice agent for Gmail (14 points | 4 comments)
22. Greg K-H: "Writing new code in Rust is a win for all of us" (421 points | 204 comments)
23. The Buenos Aires Constant (9 points | 1 comment)
24. Customizable HTML Select (177 points | 115 comments)
25. I put my heart and soul into this AI but nobody cares (146 points | 68 comments)
26. Lox – Oxidized Astrodynamics – A safe, ergonomic astrodynamics library (103 points | 39 comments)
27. Software engineering job openings hit five-year low? (89 points | 73 comments)
28. 1972 Unix V2 "Beta" Resurrected (400 points | 124 comments)
29. Coral USB Accelerator with Google's Edge TPU (59 points | 62 comments)
30. RT64: N64 graphics renderer in emulators and native ports (109 points | 40 comments)
